articles.title: Real life 'Snakes on a plane' as AirAsia flight is diverted to Kuching - New Straits Times
articles.description: PUTRAJAYA: AirAsia had to divert its Kuala Lumpur-Tawau flight to Kuching, owing to a snake onboard, last night.
